overview: The picture tells about the bailiff evicting the debtors on the payment of loans for housing. During one of his rounds, he meets a single mother who has not paid her mortgage for several months. An employee may temporarily not evict tenants if they pay 10% of the amount owed. However, the woman has no money. Finding herself in a difficult situation, she asks for help from the bailiff to find the necessary funds.
title: The Bailiff
